subject: Indian History
topic: Vedic Kal: Samajik, Rajnaitik aur Dharmik Jeevan
question_en: What was the primary occupation of the Vedic people?
question_hi: वैदिक लोगों का प्राथमिक श्रम क्या था?
explanation_en: The primary occupation of the Vedic people was agriculture.
explanation_hi: वैदिक लोगों का प्राथमिक श्रम कृषि था।

subject: Indian History
topic: Vedic Kal: Samajik, Rajnaitik aur Dharmik Jeevan
question_en: Who was the author of the Rigveda?
explanation_en: Rishi Atri is considered the author of the Rigveda.
explanation_hi: रिग्वेद के लेखक रishi अत्रि माने जाते हैं।

subject: Indian History
topic: Vedic Kal: Samajik, Rajnaitik aur Dharmik Jeevan
question_en: What was the name of the Vedic god of the sky?
question_hi: वैदिक आकाश का देवता का नाम क्या था?
explanation_en: The Vedic god of the sky was Indra.
explanation_hi: वैदिक आकाश का देवता इंद्र था।

subject: Indian History
topic: Vedic Kal: Samajik, Rajnaitik aur Dharmik Jeevan
question_en: What was the name of the Vedic social system?
question_hi: वैदिक समाजिक तंत्र का नाम क्या था?
explanation_en: The Vedic social system was based on the varna system.
explanation_hi: वैदिक समाजिक तंत्र वर्ण-व्यवस्था पर आधारित था।

subject: Indian History
topic: Vedic Kal: Samajik, Rajnaitik aur Dharmik Jeevan
question_en: Who was the ruler of the Vedic period?
question_hi: वैदिक काल का शासक कौन था?
explanation_en: Raja Sudas was the ruler of the Vedic period.
explanation_hi: राजा सुदास वैदिक काल का शासक था।

subject: Indian History
topic: Vedic Kal: Samajik, Rajnaitik aur Dharmik Jeevan
question_en: What was the name of the Vedic fire god?
question_hi: वैदिक अग्नि का देवता का नाम क्या था?
explanation_en: The Vedic fire god was Agni.
explanation_hi: वैदिक अग्नि का देवता अग्नि था।

subject: Indian History
topic: Vedic Kal: Samajik, Rajnaitik aur Dharmik Jeevan
question_en: What was the Vedic concept of the universe?
question_hi: वैदिक ब्रह्मांड का विचार क्या था?
explanation_en: The Vedic concept of the universe was eternal.
explanation_hi: वैदिक ब्रह्मांड का विचार नित्य था।

subject: Indian History
topic: Vedic Kal: Samajik, Rajnaitik aur Dharmik Jeevan
question_en: Who was the author of the Yajurveda?

explanation_hi: यजुर्वेद के लेखक रिषि यज्ञवल्क्य माने जाते हैं।

subject: Indian History

question_en: What was the name of the Vedic social class?
question_hi: वैदिक समाजिक वर्ग का नाम क्या था?
explanation_en: The Brahmin was the highest Vedic social class.
explanation_hi: वैदिक सबसे उच्च समाजिक वर्ग ब्राह्मण था।
